name: Ideal Gas
description:
Welcome to Ideal Gas, where the fate of humanity rests in your hands. Or at least, you think it does. You didn’t read the small print when you took the job. Locked away in a bunker with a sarcastic robotic assistant for company, you’ve been hired by a global organisation for a top-secret research project to do with... Balloons... Errr??

In this Explosive Ballon Based Puzzler, all you have to do is get the balloons safely to the end zone. Simple, right?

Features:
- 20+ fiendish levels (Early access)
- 3+ game modes
- 1 badly written in robotic assistant
- Unlimited explosive balloons
- 1 overcharged static wand
